description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. The interface declares pure virtual functions for handling container-related events such as start, stop, failure, and state change, all accepting a JsonObject reference as parameter.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface for handling container events, requiring implementing classes to define behaviors for container start, stop, failure, and state change events.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Called when a container starts, with event data provided as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Called when a container stops, with event data provided as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Called when a container fails, with event data provided as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Called when a container changes state, with event data provided as a JsonObject reference.
